original_title: Bart en de steen die terug naar huis ging
overview: When artist Bart Eysink Smeets decides to bring a hunebed stone from Borger back home (Scandinavia), man's meddlesome towards nature is magnified in a light and humorous way. Are the residents of Borger willing to let go of the stone? Who actually owns the stone and what does the stone itself think?
title: Bart en de steen die terug naar huis ging
